column1: I'm honored to be re-elected for a third term to represent #MD04 constituents. I want to thank the voters for putting their faith in me and I look forward to continuing to fight for you in Congress!  https://t.co/E51jJEiq5Z
Love it! https://t.co/NZh4aQp5Cc

In 2016 there wasn't a single question on climate change in any of the presidential debates.   This can't happen again.  That's why I signed a letter asking @Debates and the moderators to make climate change a focus of the 2020 debates. Read more: https://t.co/cJCGHU9bxp
Without a doubt @JoeBiden is the Commander-in-chief our country needs #DemConvention

A leader among the next generation of Democrats - committed to service and focused on winning the future.   We can take that first step toward a better future by electing @JoeBiden and more Democrats across our country this year #DemConvention https://t.co/IiezC8yOJO

A moving tribute from Mayor @KeishaBottoms for our dear friend Congressman John Lewis. The best way we can honor his legacy is to vote this November and vote for @JoeBiden.   Text VOTE to 30330 and make a plan to vote today https://t.co/22wJrjIDSe #DemConvention https://t.co/9u9sEGl3sf

Let's never forget that the Trump administration is so extreme on immigration that they’re deporting the spouses of military veterans and separating their families #DemConvention https://t.co/bd8AgOwmBP

Incredibly powerful words from @GabbyGiffords - who has turned tragedy into purpose.   With @JoeBiden as President we will finally take action to end gun violence. #DemConvention https://t.co/B6lNdEgoEk
When we all vote change happens and we can move our country forward.   Text VOTE to 30330 and make a plan to vote today https://t.co/qISE3HxpZu #DemConvention
I’m watching the Democratic National Convention to see how the Democratic ticket will welcome immigrants into our communities. Want to join me? https://t.co/D4EVFX625P #DemConvention

Excited to welcome my friend Chairman @hakeem_jeffries to the @mddems #DemConvention breakfast.  The stakes are so incredibly high and we are called to rise to the occasion. We have to win for those we fight for - the least the lost and those left behind. https://t.co/eXJR7sdYqp

Donald Trump is an incompetent unfit commander-in-chief who is making us less safe every day.   @JoeBiden has the knowledge experience and grit to protect our national security advance our values and rebuild our standing in the world #DemConvention https://t.co/ztpNQcAWP7
I'm in @StenyHoyer. Let's get it done. #DemConvention https://t.co/jJwaWUZu2Q

I agree with @staceyabrams. We're facing a public health and economic crisis and a reckoning with racial justice and inequality all because Trump is unable to lead.   We must elect @JoeBiden and @KamalaHarris in November. The soul of the nation depends on it. #DemConvention

As a nation we've been most successful when we're inspired by our leaders - like @CEXAlsobrooks @KamalaHarris & @JoeBiden   With their leadership we can once again move toward fulfilling the American promise. And despite Trump I believe that promise is still very much alive https://t.co/yXbDAAOcUy https://t.co/f0CevYhpR2

Every election we're told that this is the most important one yet. But @MichelleObama reminded us why tonight.  Echoing heroes like John Lewis who said “When you see something that is not right you must say something. You must do something.” #DemConvention https://t.co/oNzpVxQODZ

Our nation is at a crossroads. At this critical moment - as @JohnKasich said - our responsibility to our country comes first. We must come together to elect @JoeBiden and @KamalaHarris.  #DemConvention2020 #WeThePeople

.@WhipClyburn has long been an advocate for justice for all Americans. We can all learn from his leadership and commitment to faith family and public service.   I couldn't agree more. @JoeBiden  is a good man and he is a leader. #DNC2020

Heartbreaking to hear @kdurquiza share her story. Her father should be with us today. His life wasn't expendable. None of us should forget the suffering in our country  #DemConvention https://t.co/TzzuerYid5
Truth over lies. Unity over division. Hope over fear.   #TheRising https://t.co/tNVhCnZeyX

@KamalaHarris is a proven fighter and a historic running mate. @JoeBiden has picked a fantastic partner to seize this moment and lead us towards a better future. The Battle For Our Nation's Soul. https://t.co/F4p6LK0PYJ

Riddle me this @GovLarryHogan:  why are schools better than retail businesses in deciding whether to open their doors? Answer: they aren’t. Both should follow the orders of public health officers. https://t.co/IoWdXMy1k2
This is @GovLarryHogan building his off ramp. Just admit it now Governor. Your proposed plan for the November election sucks. https://t.co/X4W0HjnPgz
I stand with @GabbyGiffords. We can—and we must—make our communities safer from the scourge of gun violence.   I’m proud to be endorsed by @giffordscourage. https://t.co/qjxCOHyejj

Joe has a plan. @JoeBiden believes in an economy where every American enjoys a fair return for their work and an equal chance to get ahead. These proposals will help achieve racial equity across the American economy. https://t.co/AlwU7iag4w
.@GovLarryHogan has problems in his own back and from yards. Refocus Governor! https://t.co/0eQlDIphdk https://t.co/fV5YheueCw

I fully support the @JoeBiden plan that will expand access to care for older Americans and those with disabilities and provide Universal Childcare and Pre-K which have proven to be effective at setting up our children for success. https://t.co/GshaY3daVh

I am honored to be endorsed by @Brady_PAC and will continue to fight for common sense gun reform that will make Americans safer. https://t.co/pW7sCPthLy
@GovLarryHogan Nice but not enough. You’re a Governor with executive authority! Use it now. Time for studies is over. https://t.co/KKOTCQKHg9
Joe has always fought for what is right and justice! https://t.co/WdoT5djOvM

It took more than 6 years but now people see the real @GovLarryHogan. Ignoring racial disparities during the pandemic & supporting @realDonaldTrump’s dangerous military response to peaceful protests. Gov why are you cozying up to Trump?What happened to decency & bipartisanship? https://t.co/NCq1umWTcC
Congrats! https://t.co/DxcQOqfZ11
I’m proud to serve with U.S. Senator @tammyduckworth in the Inited States Congress. https://t.co/n13N0x6Gqo

I'm proud to keep working with @PeteButtigieg to bring people together around bold ideas and an inclusive vision for a better future.  In 2020 we must defeat Donald Trump and elect more Democrats at every level of government to bring beneficial change to our country. #WinTheEra https://t.co/OAr01ZdzUX

We have to do a better job keeping our seniors and the most vulnerable safe.  Universal testing at nursing homes is a good start but these facilities need more PPE and stricter standard practices on isolating sick and symptomatic patients. https://t.co/7Lqs0I2v3y
We can’t ask Americans to work if we can’t guarantee them PPE and safe working conditions.   No family should have to choose between their health and a paycheck. https://t.co/kock47Dm0v

.@realdonaldtrump insisting he knows better than Dr. Fauci would be comical if the consequences weren’t so dire for every american.  This administration should be listening to scientists and ramping up testing instead of contradicting them to score political points. https://t.co/xyEQRMK1Xw

Money is not reaching those who need it most. Democrats fought tooth and nail for small businesses so far only 25% of them have any received federal help.  We have to make sure relief for small businesses is distributed fairly. https://t.co/bmgXKCBfu6

I'm joining @TeamJoe on #SOULSaturday to recognize our community heroes who uphold a belief that defines who we are as Americans - that we all must look out for one another.   I know when @JoeBiden is our President we will begin to restore the soul of this nation https://t.co/gMvjyVQwUk

Congratulations to Upper Marlboro native @youngchase907 on being the #2 overall selection in this year's NFL draft! I know you’ll continue to make our County and State proud this year and for years to come.

House Democrats are fighting every day to help working families and small businesses get through this economic crisis.  This bill is an important step but we have to do more. More help for states bigger cash checks for families rent relief more testing. https://t.co/sV1v4ou8F1

Let's be clear if we allow states to go bankrupt it means teachers first responders & healthcare workers will lose their jobs. Services will be cut when families and businesses are hurting the most.  @senatemajldr is wrong. We have to help our states now. https://t.co/4sTWM8Ojja

We have one of the lowest testing rates among all developed countries.  We need a national testing strategy and must expand testing capacity. We cannot safely re-open the economy unless we ramp up testing. https://t.co/FVrtt3YDc2

Well it's hard to disagree with this one.  As a @Harvard alum (A.B. and J.D.) I'm embarrassed and saddened at Harvard's decision to accept CARES dollars.  No rationale can adequately explain this away. https://t.co/XYxJ4ZnYZ9

I’m glad that @realdonaldtrump has finally allowed states to use federal testing facilities after governors have been asking for weeks. This move will make it easier for states to test people.  Now the administration needs a plan for how to produce more tests and do it quickly. https://t.co/ayovPqxMEW

.@realdonaldtrump should stop blaming states for the lack of #Coronavirus testing. He needs to mobilize the federal government to increase our testing capacity so we can safely reopen the economy.   These are literally life and death decisions. https://t.co/JxGBfa5TsT

We need a dramatic increase in testing to re-open our economy & keep people safe. Without more testing we can't properly track the spread of #Coronavirus.   The federal government must keep its promises and ramp up testing. https://t.co/qRIjg3hUPP

State & local governments face a budget crunch that will force them to cut services & lay off teachers and first responders. That’s the last thing we need.   They need federal help & we have to give it to them. Otherwise we cannot re-open the economy and get people back to work. https://t.co/dJUefOoxYA

I agree with @BarackObama - we need a president who displays leadership tells the truth & gets things done for working families.  That is why I endorsed @JoeBiden. He will bring our country together. I will do everything I can to make him our next President. https://t.co/wXQprL9lke

MD still can’t test everyone who needs to be tested. The federal government must help now to scale up testing and stop the price of tests from skyrocketing.  Without widespread access to testing we can’t stop this pandemic or begin reopening our economy. https://t.co/eAvFVU5Gj0

The IRS is starting to send economic impact payments to qualifying individuals and families. You may need to provide additional information if you receive SSI or VA benefits or are a low-income worker.  These payments are an important step to bring relief to working families. https://t.co/ggtcVIc1ZT

Voting is a fundamental right and we should all be working to ensure every citizen can safely cast a ballot this year.  The best way to do that is by giving every American the ability to vote by mail. 33 states already allow this.  Now we have to expand this nationwide. https://t.co/I5Zb1BaqOJ

I stand with @iupat_dc51 and @GoIUPAT to put #WorkersFirst as we provide more relief during the #COVID19 crisis.  I'll keep fighting to: ✔️ Expand healthcare coverage ✔️ Protect worker retirement plans ✔️ Invest in our infrastructure   We need to take bold action now. https://t.co/g3a3DpRfrp

17 million have filed for unemployment & families across the country face severe economic uncertainty. Congress boosted benefits but it's taking a long time to process and bills are due.  I’ll keep pushing to get more relief to families as quickly as possible. We must do more. https://t.co/Df3no0kiGN

#Coronavirus is exacerbating the racial disparities - in health care in our schools & in our economy - that have already existed. This means that people of color are suffering disproportionately & not receiving the testing or treatment they need.  This has to be addressed now https://t.co/uMyCEys9si

10 million more Americans are now unemployed and working families are facing severe financial hardship.   We have to get help to them as quickly as possible - larger unemployment benefits and $1200 stimulus checks.    But we have to do much more for workers and businesses. https://t.co/N7b7sXr5mf
